## Type of Change

- [ ] `fix:` Bug fix
- [ ] `feat:` New feature
- [ ] `refactor:` Code refactoring
- [ ] `docs:` Documentation
- [ ] `test:` Tests
- [ ] `chore:` Maintenance/tooling
- [ ] `ci:` CI/CD changes

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`pnpm testAll`)
- [ ] Validation scripts pass
- [ ] Follows conventional commits format
- [ ] Updated relevant documentation
